title: Digital Tide
revealed_to_reader: Tanaka: infrastructure unsustainable OR Archivist planned perfectly
At 10% uploads, Archivist's tone shifted - desperate, pressuring
Projections: 80M by week, 200M by month, 1B by quarter
Aria decides to visit Archive - expose coercion
Still sedated periodically when programming surges

planted.element: Visit Archive to verify Archivist's claims

continuity: Days 61-65, upload cascade exponential, Aria planning Archive investigation leads to Ch12 tentpole
